name: Bay Model Visitor Center
description: Free federal visitor center featuring a 1.5-acre hydraulic model of San Francisco Bay and Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta.
fullDescription: Free federal visitor center featuring a 1.5-acre hydraulic model of San Francisco Bay and Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta.
keywords: Bay Model, Sausalito, Army Corps of Engineers, free museum, San Francisco Bay model, Sacramento Delta, hydraulic model
